“Heartbreaker” started as a job interview task I moulded in one weekend. 18 months later, my teammates and I won an award with “Heartbreaker” during a global gamedev conference, surpassing over a 100 professional indie teams. How did we achieve it?

The Development of “Heartbreaker” ‚Äì Introduction

When I started writing about the production of “Heartbreaker,” my mind went blank. I wanted to write an abstract of the development process, but I realized it wouldn’t offer much help for your own games. So I decided to pick up the most crucial things that impacted me as a rookie producer and eventually brought my team a success.

First, I encourage you to get to know ‚ÄúHeartbreaker.‚Äù This will help you follow the text more easily. You can even download and try the game yourself.
